verses.text: \w In|strong="H3068"\w* \w those|strong="H1992"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \w Hezekiah|strong="H2396"\w* \w became|strong="H2470"\w* \w mortally|strong="H4191"\w* \w ill|strong="H2470"\w*. \w The|strong="H3588"\w* \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w* \w Isaiah|strong="H3470"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Amoz \w came|strong="H3068"\w* \w to|strong="H4191"\w* \w him|strong="H6680"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* said, “\w This|strong="H3541"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w what|strong="H3541"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w says|strong="H3541"\w*: ‘\w Put|strong="H4191"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w order|strong="H6680"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w are|strong="H3117"\w* \w about|strong="H3117"\w* \w to|strong="H4191"\w* \w die|strong="H4191"\w*; \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w recover|strong="H2421"\w*.’”

\w Then|strong="H3068"\w* \w Hezekiah|strong="H2396"\w* \w turned|strong="H5437"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w face|strong="H6440"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w wall|strong="H7023"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w prayed|strong="H6419"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*,

saying, “\w Please|strong="H4994"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w remember|strong="H2142"\w* \w how|strong="H4994"\w* \w I|strong="H1980"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w walked|strong="H1980"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w You|strong="H6440"\w* faithfully \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w with|strong="H1980"\w* \w wholehearted|strong="H8003"\w* \w devotion|strong="H3820"\w*; \w I|strong="H1980"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w done|strong="H6213"\w* \w what|strong="H2896"\w* \w was|strong="H3068"\w* \w good|strong="H2896"\w* \w in|strong="H1980"\w* \w Your|strong="H3068"\w* \w sight|strong="H5869"\w*.” \w And|strong="H1980"\w* \w Hezekiah|strong="H2396"\w* \w wept|strong="H1058"\w* \w bitterly|strong="H1419"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w word|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w came|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w Isaiah|strong="H3470"\w*, \w saying|strong="H1697"\w*,

“\w Go|strong="H1980"\w* \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w tell|strong="H8085"\w* \w Hezekiah|strong="H2396"\w* \w that|strong="H7200"\w* \w this|strong="H3541"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w what|strong="H3541"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* father \w David|strong="H1732"\w*, \w says|strong="H3541"\w*: ‘\w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w prayer|strong="H8605"\w*; \w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w seen|strong="H7200"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w tears|strong="H1832"\w*. \w Behold|strong="H2005"\w*, \w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w add|strong="H3254"\w* \w fifteen|strong="H2568"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* \w to|strong="H1980"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w life|strong="H3117"\w*.

\w And|strong="H4428"\w* \w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w will|strong="H4428"\w* \w deliver|strong="H5337"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w* \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w this|strong="H2063"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w hand|strong="H3709"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* Assyria. \w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w will|strong="H4428"\w* \w defend|strong="H1598"\w* \w this|strong="H2063"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w*.\f + \fr 38:6 \ft MT and LXX; DSS includes for My sake and for the sake of My servant David; see 2 Kings 20:6.\f*

\w This|strong="H2088"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H1697"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* sign \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w you|strong="H6213"\w* \w from|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w that|strong="H3068"\w* \w He|strong="H6213"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w what|strong="H1697"\w* \w He|strong="H6213"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w promised|strong="H1696"\w*:

\w I|strong="H2005"\w* \w will|strong="H8121"\w* \w make|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H7725"\w* \w sun|strong="H8121"\w*’s \w shadow|strong="H6738"\w* \w that|strong="H7725"\w* \w falls|strong="H3381"\w* \w on|strong="H3381"\w* \w the|strong="H7725"\w* \w stairway|strong="H4609"\w* \w of|strong="H6738"\w* Ahaz \w go|strong="H3381"\w* \w back|strong="H7725"\w* \w ten|strong="H6235"\w* \w steps|strong="H4609"\w*.’” \w So|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H7725"\w* sunlight \w went|strong="H3381"\w* \w back|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H7725"\w* \w ten|strong="H6235"\w* \w steps|strong="H4609"\w* \w it|strong="H7725"\w* \w had|strong="H8121"\w* \w descended|strong="H3381"\w*. Hezekiah’s Song of Thanksgiving

\w This|strong="H4428"\w* \w is|strong="H4428"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w writing|strong="H4385"\w* \w by|strong="H2421"\w* \w Hezekiah|strong="H2396"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* after \w his|strong="H2396"\w* \w illness|strong="H2483"\w* \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w recovery|strong="H2421"\w*:

\w I|strong="H3117"\w* said, “\w In|strong="H8141"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* prime \f + \fr 38:10 \ft Or In the quiet or In the middle\f* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w my|strong="H3117"\w* \w life|strong="H3117"\w* \w I|strong="H3117"\w* must \w go|strong="H3212"\w* \w through|strong="H3212"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* \w gates|strong="H8179"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w Sheol|strong="H7585"\w* \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w be|strong="H3117"\w* \w deprived|strong="H6485"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* \w remainder|strong="H3499"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w my|strong="H3117"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w*.”

\w I|strong="H7200"\w* said, “\w I|strong="H7200"\w* \w will|strong="H3808"\w* \w never|strong="H3808"\w* \w again|strong="H5750"\w* \w see|strong="H7200"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w even|strong="H5750"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* land \w of|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w living|strong="H2416"\w*; \w I|strong="H7200"\w* \w will|strong="H3808"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w longer|strong="H5750"\w* \w look|strong="H7200"\w* \w on|strong="H7200"\w* mankind \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w those|strong="H3427"\w* \w who|strong="H3427"\w* \w dwell|strong="H3427"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w this|strong="H7200"\w* \w world|strong="H2309"\w*.

\w My|strong="H4480"\w* \w dwelling|strong="H1755"\w* \w has|strong="H3117"\w* been picked \w up|strong="H5704"\w* \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w removed|strong="H5265"\w* \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w me|strong="H4480"\w* \w like|strong="H5704"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w shepherd|strong="H7473"\w*’s tent. \w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w have|strong="H3117"\w* \w rolled|strong="H7088"\w* \w up|strong="H5704"\w* \w my|strong="H4480"\w* \w life|strong="H2416"\w* \w like|strong="H5704"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* weaver; \w He|strong="H3117"\w* \w cuts|strong="H1214"\w* \w me|strong="H4480"\w* \w off|strong="H4480"\w* \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* \w loom|strong="H1803"\w*; \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w until|strong="H5704"\w* \w night|strong="H3915"\w* \w You|strong="H3117"\w* \w make|strong="H7999"\w* \w an|strong="H4480"\w* \w end|strong="H7999"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w me|strong="H4480"\w*.

\w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w composed|strong="H7737"\w* myself \f + \fr 38:13 \ft Or I cried out; see Targum Yonaton.\f* \w until|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w morning|strong="H1242"\w*. \w Like|strong="H3651"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* lion \w He|strong="H3117"\w* \w breaks|strong="H7665"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* \w bones|strong="H6106"\w*; \w from|strong="H3117"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w until|strong="H5704"\w* \w night|strong="H3915"\w* \w You|strong="H3605"\w* \w make|strong="H7999"\w* \w an|strong="H7999"\w* \w end|strong="H7999"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w me|strong="H7737"\w*.

\w I|strong="H3651"\w* chirp \w like|strong="H3651"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w swallow|strong="H5693"\w* \w or|strong="H5483"\w* \w crane|strong="H5483"\w*; \w I|strong="H3651"\w* \w moan|strong="H1897"\w* \w like|strong="H3651"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w dove|strong="H3123"\w*. \w My|strong="H3651"\w* \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* grow weak \w as|strong="H3651"\w* \w I|strong="H3651"\w* \w look|strong="H5869"\w* \w upward|strong="H4791"\w*. \w O|strong="H3068"\w* Lord, \w I|strong="H3651"\w* am \w oppressed|strong="H6234"\w*; \w be|strong="H5869"\w* \w my|strong="H3651"\w* \w security|strong="H6148"\w*.”

\w What|strong="H4100"\w* \w can|strong="H4100"\w* \w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w say|strong="H1696"\w*? \w He|strong="H1931"\w* \w has|strong="H4100"\w* \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w me|strong="H5315"\w*, \w and|strong="H6213"\w* \w He|strong="H1931"\w* \w Himself|strong="H5315"\w* \w has|strong="H4100"\w* \w done|strong="H6213"\w* \w this|strong="H6213"\w*. \w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w will|strong="H5315"\w* walk slowly \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* \w because|strong="H5921"\w* \w of|strong="H8141"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* anguish \w of|strong="H8141"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* \w soul|strong="H5315"\w*.

\w O|strong="H3068"\w* Lord, \w by|strong="H5921"\w* \w such|strong="H3605"\w* \w things|strong="H3605"\w* \w men|strong="H3605"\w* \w live|strong="H2421"\w*, \w and|strong="H2421"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w of|strong="H7307"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w* finds \w life|strong="H2416"\w*. \w You|strong="H3605"\w* \w have|strong="H3605"\w* \w restored|strong="H2421"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w health|strong="H2492"\w* \w and|strong="H2421"\w* \w have|strong="H3605"\w* let \w me|strong="H5921"\w* \w live|strong="H2421"\w*.

\w Surely|strong="H3588"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* \w own|strong="H5315"\w* \w welfare|strong="H7965"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w had|strong="H3588"\w* \w such|strong="H3605"\w* \w great|strong="H4751"\w* anguish; \w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w Your|strong="H3605"\w* \w love|strong="H2836"\w* \w has|strong="H3588"\w* \w delivered|strong="H2836"\w* \w me|strong="H5315"\w* \w from|strong="H5315"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w pit|strong="H7845"\w* \w of|strong="H3605"\w* oblivion, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w You|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H7965"\w* \w cast|strong="H7993"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* \w sins|strong="H2399"\w* behind \w Your|strong="H3605"\w* \w back|strong="H1460"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w Sheol|strong="H7585"\w* \w cannot|strong="H3808"\w* \w thank|strong="H3034"\w* \w You|strong="H3588"\w*; \w Death|strong="H4194"\w* \w cannot|strong="H3808"\w* \w praise|strong="H1984"\w* \w You|strong="H3588"\w*. \w Those|strong="H3588"\w* \w who|strong="H3588"\w* \w descend|strong="H3381"\w* \w to|strong="H3381"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w Pit|strong="H7585"\w* \w cannot|strong="H3808"\w* \w hope|strong="H7663"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w Your|strong="H3588"\w* faithfulness.

\w The|strong="H3117"\w* \w living|strong="H2416"\w*, only \w the|strong="H3117"\w* \w living|strong="H2416"\w*, \w can|strong="H3045"\w* \w thank|strong="H3034"\w* \w You|strong="H3117"\w*, \w as|strong="H3117"\w* \w I|strong="H3117"\w* do \w today|strong="H3117"\w*; fathers \w will|strong="H1121"\w* \w tell|strong="H3045"\w* \w their|strong="H3045"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w about|strong="H3045"\w* \w Your|strong="H3045"\w* faithfulness.

\w The|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w save|strong="H3467"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w*; \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w play|strong="H5059"\w* \w songs|strong="H5058"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w stringed|strong="H5058"\w* \w instruments|strong="H5058"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* \w lives|strong="H2416"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w Now|strong="H5921"\w* \w Isaiah|strong="H3470"\w* \w had|strong="H3470"\w* said, “Prepare \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w lump|strong="H1690"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* pressed \w figs|strong="H8384"\w* \w and|strong="H2421"\w* \w apply|strong="H4799"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w boil|strong="H7822"\w*, \w and|strong="H2421"\w* \w he|strong="H5921"\w* \w will|strong="H8384"\w* \w recover|strong="H2421"\w*.”

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w Hezekiah|strong="H2396"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w asked|strong="H4100"\w*, “\w What|strong="H4100"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* sign \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w go|strong="H5927"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*?”
